subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: '469 availability
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
Hi Frank,

I think you mentioned once before you were thinking about using PCBExpress 
to make boards.  I could probably make them a lot cheaper than they do. 
The only drawback I have is that if they are double-sided boards, I can't 
do plated-through holes and have to use "C" wires for thru-board 
connections.

Zack

On Tue, 8 Apr 2008, Frank Sumption wrote:

>
>
> I hate to ask for anything. I can afford what I need for myself. What I want to do is make some printed circuit boards that have the sweep, and amplifiers, then I would only have to add whatever tuner I want to use to form a system, and I could make the boards available. I wouldn't mind putting this stuff together for others, but the requests/demands are so overwhelming, there just isn't enough time.
>
> Frank-S
